card_text: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can make this card gain 100 ATK for each Monster Type currently in your GY, until the end of this turn. You can target 1 other face-up monster on the field; this card cannot attack for the rest of this turn, also that monster loses DEF equal to this card's ATK, then if its DEF becomes 0 by this effect, destroy it. You can only use this effect of "Leraje the God of Archery" once per turn.
